blackbelt_repetitions.label: Copies
blackbelt_repetitions.description: The number of times the objects on the build plate are printed. Note that the repetitions will not be visible in Layer View.

blackbelt_repetitions_distance.label: Distance Between Copies
blackbelt_repetitions_distance.description: The distance the belt moves between repetitions.

blackbelt_z_offset_gap.label: Belt Offset
blackbelt_z_offset_gap.description: The distance between the part and the conveyor belt. Adjust the gap to the belt to control adhesion between the print and the belt. Smaller gap means more adhesion, a bigger gap means less adhesion.

blackbelt_secondary_fans_enabled.label: Enable Secondary Print Fans
blackbelt_secondary_fans_enabled.description: Enables the secondary print cooling fans while printing.

blackbelt_secondary_fans_speed.label: Secondary Print Fan Speed
blackbelt_secondary_fans_speed.description: The speed at which the secondary print cooling fans spin. The secondary fans speed is relative to the primary cooling fan speed.

blackbelt_z_offset.label: Belt Offset
blackbelt_z_offset.description: The offset to the belt (0.1 = big gap, 0.3 = small gap)

machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;start code BLACKBELT 3D Printer 3.6.2.2

G90                             ; Set to Absolute Positioning
M82                             ; Set extruder to absolute mode
G21                             ; Metric values
G92 X0 Y0 Z0 E0                 ; Set all axis to 0

;home X and move Y dow
G1 Y2                           ; Move Y axis off the bed
G28                             ; Home X and move Y down
G1 Y5                           ; Move Y axis up to prevent grinding on the belt
G1 X170 Z5 F4000                ; Move X to the center
M400                            ; Wait for this move to finish

;probe Y
M908 P5 S10                     ; Setting the motor current of the Y1 motor off
M908 P1 S10                     ; Setting the motor current of the Y2 motor off
G1 Y20 G3000                    ; Move Y up
M400                            ; Wait for current moves to finish
M908 P5 S20                     ; Setting the motor current of the Y1 motor very low
M908 P1 S20                     ; Setting the motor current of the Y2 motor off
G1 Y0 F500                      ; Move Y down into the belt
M400                            ; Wait for current moves to finish
M908 P5 S140                    ; Setting the motor current of the Y1 motor to normal
M908 P1 S140                    ; Setting the motor current of the Y2 motor to normal
G92 Y{blackbelt_z_offset}

;purge
G1 Y3                           ; Move Y axis off the bed
G1 E15                          ; Extruder 15mm material and move to the side
G1 Z10 E20 F500                 ; Move belt 10mm and keep extruding
G1 Z30                          ; Move the belt a bit further without extruding
G92 Z0                          ; Zero Belt
G92 E0                          ; Zero the extruded length
G1 E-3 F3900                    ; Retract 3mm at 65mm/s

;prepare printing
G92 E-4.5                       ; Add 1.5mm start distance
M117 BLACKBELT Printing...

;˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅ - copy from here / paste codes just under here - ˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅˅

M107                            ; Start with the fan off

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;end code BLACKBELT 3D Printer 3.6.2.2

G92 E0                   ; Set Extruder to zero
G92 Z0                   ; Set Belt to zero
G1 E-3                   ; Retract 3mm
G1 Z30                   ; Move Belt 30mm before starting up the next product
G92 Z0                   ; Set Belt to zero again

G1 Y100                  ; Move Y up to grease the linear bearing

G1 X170 Y{blackbelt_z_offset}
G92 E0   ; Set Extruder to zero


;˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄ - copy up to here / paste codes just above here - ˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄˄

M104 S0                  ; Extruder heater off
M140 S0                  ; Heated bed heater off
M106 S0                  ; Part cooling fan off
M106 P1 S0               ; Rear fan off
G92 Z0                   ; Set belt to zero
G1 Z30 F1000             ; Move the belt 30mm further
G92 Z0                   ; Set belt to zero
G1 X0 Y10 F2000          ; Move print head to the lower corner
M18                      ; Disable all stepper motors

M117 Printing done       ; Display a message on the screen

wall_thickness.value: (4 if machine_nozzle_size <= 0.4 else 2 if machine_nozzle_size >= 0.8 else 3) * wall_line_width_x

coasting_volume.value: 0 if machine_nozzle_size == 0.25 else 1 if machine_nozzle_size == 0.4 else 2 if machine_nozzle_size == 0.6 else 3 if machine_nozzle_size == 0.8 else 4
